channel.title: One Year of Bootstrapping a SaaS Startup
channel.description: Hey everyone! I wrote a blogpost about my experiences of bootstrapping Klart.co for a year. I'd love to hear your thoughts about it :slight_smile:. You can find it here: [https://drikerf.com/one-year-of-bootstrapping-a-saas-startup/](https://drikerf.com/one-year-of-bootstrapping-a-saas-startup/).
